title: Human Resource Sales Associate Job at Pruvia Integrated Limited
content:
Pruvia Integrated Limited, we are general service merchants with a strong desire to ensure customer satisfaction in the midst of efficient and effective service delivery. As an organization we are driven by the dictum of
‘Impossibility is Nothing’.

PIL was conceived in 2007, as regards to its incorporation and duly registered in 2013 with Corporate Affairs Commission of Nigeria (CAC) with Registration Number RC 1097861. It originated in response to providing world class services and solutions to the society at large and offering an alternative that is satisfactory in areas of our specialty. It has carried out service rendering duties in various states of Nigeria and within the ever bustling business environment of Lagos.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Sales Associate
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Brief


	We are seeking a skilled HR Sales Associate to join our team. The ideal candidate will make sure all HR Sales activities align with our business goals.


Responsibilities


	Identify and engage prospective clients, introducing them to our HR Services.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients to ensure long-term business success.
	Conduct market research to understand client needs, industry trends, and competitor activities.
	Deliver compelling product demonstrations and presentations tailored to client requirements.
	Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve or exceed individual and team targets.
	Collaborate with the marketing team to design campaigns that generate quality leads.
	Provide accurate sales forecasts, pipeline reports, and regular performance updates to management.
	Address client inquiries and concerns, ensuring high customer satisfaction


Requirements and skills


	BSc / HND in Business, Marketing, Human Resources, or related fields.
	1-3 years of proven experience preferably B2B Sales,
	Ability to build rapport and establish trust with clients quickly.
	Results-oriented with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	A strong understanding of HR processes and challenges is an added advantage.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Proficient in using CRM tools, Microsoft Office, and other sales enablement platforms.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: jobpruvia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Graphics and Motion Designer Job at CIG Motors Co. Limited
content:
CIG Motors Co. Limited has begun on a soft landing since 2013 following a pact signed with Guangzhou Automobile Group Co., Limited (GAC MOTOR) to establish and manage distribution network in Nigeria, Africa. The group, headquartered in Guangzhou China, launched business operation in Nigeria at the peak of Automobile boom based on Government advocacy for the production of brand new vehicles in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphics and Motion Designer

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a talented and creative Graphics and Motion Designer to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually stunning designs and motion content across digital and print platforms.
	The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio that demonstrates expertise in graphic design, animation, and visual storytelling.


Responsibilities


	Design static and animated graphics for digital campaigns, social media, websites, advertisements, presentations, and print materials.
	Create motion graphics, animations, explainer videos, and video assets for marketing and content production.
	Collaborate with marketing, social media, and content teams to understand project requirements and translate concepts into engaging visuals.
	Edit and animate video content using After Effects, Premiere Pro, or equivalent software.
	Ensure all designs align with brand guidelines and visual identity.
	Stay updated on industry trends, design best practices, and emerging motion graphics tools and techniques.
	Manage multiple design projects and meet tight deadlines without compromising quality.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Animation, Multimedia Arts, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
	Proven experience (2+ years) as a graphic designer and motion graphics artist.
	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere Pro) and other relevant design tools.
	Strong understanding of composition, colour theory, typography, and layout.
	Ability to storyboard, design, and animate from concept to final output.
	Experience with video editing and post-production workflows is a plus.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills.
	Ability to take constructive feedback and iterate quickly.

title: Chief Investment Officer Job at First Excelsia Professional Services Limited
content:
First Excelsia Professional Services Limited - Our client is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Investment Officer
Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Asset Management

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client is seeking a highly competent and result-driven Chief Investment Officer to join its dynamic team.
	The Chief Investment Officer (CIO) will be responsible for setting and executing the investment strategy of the asset management company.
	The ideal role holder will lead portfolio management, research, and trading functions to drive superior investment performance across all asset classes. The role requires balancing long-term investment strategy with short-term performance targets while managing risk and ensuring compliance.


Job Responsibilities


	Develop and implement the company’s overall investment philosophy and strategy.
	Set asset allocation models and risk parameters in line with client objectives and market conditions.
	Advise the Board and Executive Management on market trends, investment opportunities, and risks.
	Lead and mentor the investment and research teams, including portfolio managers, analysts, and traders.
	Build a high-performance culture that fosters collaboration, accountability, and innovation.
	Oversee the management and performance of all investment portfolios.
	Monitor and adjust portfolios to achieve targeted returns and risk metrics.
	Ensure consistency in the investment approach across all asset classes.
	Supervise trading activities and ensure alignment with portfolio strategy and market conditions.
	Ensure trades are executed efficiently, ethically, and in compliance with relevant regulations.
	Support client relationship teams with performance reporting and investment communication.
	Participate in client meetings and presentations as needed to explain strategy and results.
	Ensure investment activities comply with internal policies, regulatory guidelines, and fiduciary standards.
	Work closely with compliance and risk management teams to monitor portfolio and market risks.


Person Specification


	A Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Accounting, or a related field (required).
	Minimum of 10–15 years of experience in asset or investment management.
	MBA, CFA or other advanced investment qualifications (strongly preferred).
	Relevant regulatory certifications/licensing (as applicable in your jurisdiction).
	Proven track record of leading investment teams and managing portfolios across multiple asset classes.
	Experience in developing and executing investment strategies and asset allocation models.
	Strong understanding of financial markets, instruments, and portfolio risk management.
	Ability to set and articulate long-term investment strategies.
	Proven ability to lead and inspire investment teams.
	Deep analytical skills and ability to interpret complex data sets.
	Strong verbal and written communication skills; ability to explain complex investment concepts clearly.
	High level of professionalism and a strong orientation to client needs.
	Strong integrity, judgment, and commitment to regulatory and fiduciary responsibilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: talentsearch@firstexcelsia.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Executive Assistant Job at Universal Human Resource Consult
content:
Universal Human Resource Consult - Our client is seeking suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive Assistant 

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	Our client is seeking a highly organized, proactive, and resourceful Executive Assistant to provide comprehensive administrative support to senior executives. 
	The ideal candidate will be detail-oriented, possess excellent communication skills, and be capable of managing a wide range of executive and administrative duties with confidentiality and professionalism.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide high-level administrative support to the Executive, including managing schedules, meetings, and travel arrangements.
	Coordinate and manage the executive’s calendar, ensuring optimal time management and prioritization.
	Prepare and edit correspondence, reports, presentations, and other documents.
	Manage confidential information with discretion and integrity.
	Organize and maintain files, records, and office systems.
	Assist with special projects, research, and reporting tasks as required.
	Attend and document minutes of executive meetings, follow up on action items, and track progress.
	Coordinate logistics for events, meetings, and engagements.
	Serve as the first point of contact for internal and external stakeholders.
	Liaise with departments and teams to support the executive’s workflow and communication.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 3–5 years of experience as an Executive Assistant or in a similar administrative role.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook).
	Exceptional organizational, time management, and multitasking skills.
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Ability to handle sensitive information with the highest level of confidentiality.
	Experience working in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.


Key Competencies:


	Professionalism and discretion
	Attention to detail
	Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills
	Initiative and problem-solving ability
	Flexibility and adaptability.


Remuneration


	Competitive salary and benefits, commensurate with experience and qualifications.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter in PDF to: uhrconsultlimited2019@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: General Manager Job at Excel and Grace Consulting
content:
Excel and Grace Consulting is a fast-paced business consulting organization with a track record of delivering exceptional business solutions to small and medium-scale enterprises in Nigeria, Ghana, Germany, Switzerland, Canada, etc. We are certified management consultants with the International Council of Management Consulting Institutes (CMC-Global) with over 18 years of experience. Our team of experts and consultants have authored over 20 books on business management, business structure, business operations, human resources, organizational structure, employee development, money management, and so on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Iyana-Ipaja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Hospitality & FMCG

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic and results-driven General Manager to oversee and coordinate operations across our hospitality and FMCG business units.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business growth, ensuring operational efficiency, managing teams, and maintaining high customer satisfaction standards.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee daily operations of both the hospitality and FMCG units.
	Develop and implement strategic plans to drive sales, profitability, and market share.
	Lead, coach, and manage department heads and staff to ensure high performance.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory and safety standards.
	Analyze business performance and generate regular reports for the executive team.
	Ensure exceptional customer service and operational excellence across all business outlets.
	Manage budgeting, financial reporting, and cost control initiatives.
	Monitor inventory, supply chain, and vendor relationships to ensure smooth operations.
	Identify opportunities for business development and process improvement.
	Represent the company in external engagements and maintain a positive public image.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, Hospitality Management, or related field (MBA is an added advantage).
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in a senior management role within the hospitality or FMCG sector.
	Strong leadership and people management skills.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and decision-making abilities.
	Proficient in budgeting, reporting, and operational planning.
	Hands-on experience with inventory systems, POS, and supply chain management.
	Must reside in or be willing to relocate to Iyana-Ipaja or its environs.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: eandg.tprecruiters@gmail.com using "General Manager - Iyana-Ipaja" as the subject of the email.
